name: AzureMariadb
help: Manage Azure Database for MariaDB servers.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Space-separated list of log filenames on the server to download.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServerName
properties.help: Name of the server. The name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen (-) character. Minimum 3 characters and maximum 63 characters.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServerName
properties.help: Name of the server. The name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen (-) character. Minimum 3 characters and maximum 63 characters.

properties.name: FileLastWritten
properties.help: Integer in hours to indicate file last modify time, default value is 72.

properties.name: FilenameContains
properties.help: The pattern that file name should match.

properties.name: MaxFileSize
properties.help: The file size limitation to filter files.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the database.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServerName
properties.help: Name of the server. The name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen (-) character. Minimum 3 characters and maximum 63 characters.

properties.name: Charset
properties.help: The charset of the database.

properties.name: Collation
properties.help: The collation of the database.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the database.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServerName
properties.help: Name of the server. The name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen (-) character. Minimum 3 characters and maximum 63 characters.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the database.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServerName
properties.help: Name of the server. The name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen (-) character. Minimum 3 characters and maximum 63 characters.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the server. The name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen (-) character. Minimum 3 characters and maximum 63 characters.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: SkuName
properties.help: The name of the sku. Follows the convention {pricing tier}_{compute generation}_{vCores} in shorthand. Examples: B_Gen5_1, GP_Gen5_4, MO_Gen5_16.

properties.name: AutoGrow
properties.help: Enable or disable autogrow of the storage. Default value is Enabled.

properties.name: BackupRetention
properties.help: The number of days a backup is retained. Range of 7 to 35 days. Default is 7 days.

properties.name: GeoRedundantBackup
properties.help: Enable or disable geo-redundant backups. Default value is Disabled. Not supported in Basic pricing tier.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: SslEnforcement
properties.help: Enable or disable ssl enforcement for connections to server. Default is Enabled.

properties.name: StorageSize
properties.help: The storage capacity of the server (unit is megabytes). Minimum 5120 and increases in 1024 increments. Default is 51200.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: Server major version.

properties.name: AdminPassword
properties.help: The password of the administrator. Minimum 8 characters and maximum 128 characters. Password must contain characters from three of the following categories: English uppercase letters, English lowercase letters, numbers, and non-alphanumeric characters.

properties.name: AdminUser
properties.help: Administrator username for the server. Once set, it cannot be changed.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the server. The name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen (-) character. Minimum 3 characters and maximum 63 characters.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: SourceServer
properties.help: The name or ID of the source server to restore from.

properties.name: BackupRetention
properties.help: The number of days a backup is retained. Range of 7 to 35 days. Default is 7 days.

properties.name: GeoRedundantBackup
properties.help: Enable or disable geo-redundant backups. Default value is Disabled. Not supported in Basic pricing tier.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: SkuName
properties.help: The name of the sku. Defaults to sku of the source server. Follows the convention {pricing tier}_{compute generation}_{vCores} in shorthand. Examples: B_Gen5_1, GP_Gen5_4, MO_Gen5_16.

properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: Custom
properties.help: Wait until the condition satisfies a custom JMESPath query. E.g. provisioningState!='InProgress', instanceView.statuses[?code=='PowerState/running'].

properties.name: Exists
properties.help: Wait until the resource exists.

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: Polling interval in seconds.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Maximum wait in seconds.
